alert.note: Alert for Calcasieu; Jefferson Davis (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 31 at 5:57PM CDT until July 31 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lake Charles has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Jefferson Davis Parish in southwestern Louisiana... Southeastern Calcasieu Parish in southwestern Louisiana... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 557 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Iowa, moving southwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lake Charles, Welsh, Iowa, Lake Charles Regional Airport, Hayes, Holmwood, Lacassine, and Bell City. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 37 and 50. Interstate 210 between mile markers 8 and 10. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
